name: Karby's Adventure
description:
Follow Karby into the ancient ruins in search for treasure.

  • Defeat various enemies and a boss at the end to get to the treasure vault.
  • Collect gems along the way in hidden parts of the levels.
  • Jump across and scale the platforms by clinging onto the ledges.

Controls:

  • W: up/jump
  • A: walk left
  • S: down
  • D: walk right
